author: Matt Viser and Josh Dawsey, The Washington Post
title: Michigan Gov. Whitmer is rising star for Dems and target for Republicans...
description:
On Friday afternoon, Michigan Gov. Gretchen Whitmer, a Democrat, sat at a table draped in black. 
 With a sign language interpreter behind her, she delivered a sober update on the coronavirus outbreak in her state, urging residents to stay off the roads and a…
